de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia.measures.PathBasedComparator

  • Packages that use PathBasedComparator 
    Package Description
    de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia.measures  

    • Uses of PathBasedComparator in de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia.measures

      Subclasses of PathBasedComparator in de.tudarmstadt.ukp.similarity.algorithms.wikipedia.measures 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  LeacockChodorowAverageComparator 
      class  LeacockChodorowBestComparator 
      class  LeacockChodorowComparator
      Implements the relatedness measure by Leacock and Chodorow (1998) lch(c1,c2) = - log(minPathLength(c1,c2) / 2 * depth of the hierarchy) lch(c1,c2) = - log(minPL(c1,c2) / 2 * depth) = log( 2*depth / minPL(c1,c2) ) minPathLength is measured in edges (original definition measures in nodes).
      class  LeacockChodorowSelectivityComparator 
      class  PathLengthAverageComparator 
      class  PathLengthBestComparator 
      class  PathLengthComparator
      Implements the distance measure by Rada et al. (1989).
      class  PathLengthSelectivityComparator 
      class  WuPalmerAverageComparator 
      class  WuPalmerBestComparator 
      class  WuPalmerComparator
      Implements the relatedness measure by Wu Palmer et al. (1994).
